product_title: x The Motherchic Al Fresco Strappy Button Up Midi Sundress
product_details_and_care:
From a collaboration with fashion/lifestyle blogger Lindsey Schuster, cute pieces like this one prove that looking good can be a breeze—even on crazy-busy days. Sweet prints and a strappy back amp up the charm of this button-front woven dress cut for flowy ease and cool comfort.
50" length (size Medium)

V-neck
